title: enni mArulu
sahitya:
enni mArulu nE vinna vincinanU minnakuNDuDa nIku nyAyamA


anupallavi

  pannaga shayana kannaDa tagunA vannela pincadhAri nannu kApADaka


caraNam    kari ninnu rammana tvaranEgi gAci makarininE trmshaga lEdA 
karuNatO vEga nI dariki jErpava muraLIdhara bAlakrSNa vara dAyaka
